entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then a few flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
